questions.question: The two output waves of an astable multivibrator are ------------ degrees out of phase with each other.

explanations.a: Incorrect—this phase difference is not typical.
explanations.b: Correct—one transistor is ON while the other is OFF.
explanations.c: 270° phase difference is not applicable here.

questions.question: The frequency of oscillation of an astable multivibrator depends on

explanations.a: Collector resistor affects voltage swing, not frequency directly.
explanations.b: Correct—the RC time constant controls charging/discharging rate.
explanations.c: β affects gain, but not frequency.
explanations.d: No input pulse in astable mode—it oscillates on its own.

explanations.b: Correct—β must be high enough to ensure saturation and cutoff transitions.
